languages.text: "Не заставляй меня ждать слишком долго, {name}. Мое оружие устало томиться в ножнах".

traits.locale_text: "Не заставляй меня ждать слишком долго, {name}. Мое оружие устало томиться в ножнах".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Do not keep me waiting too long, {name}. My weapon is tired of languishing in its sheath."
languages.original_text: "Не заставляй меня ждать слишком долго, {name}. Мое оружие устало томиться в ножнах".

traits.locale_text: "Do not keep me waiting too long, {name}. My weapon is tired of languishing in its sheath."

languages.text: «No me hagas esperar demasiado, {name}. A mi arma no le gusta languidecer en su vaina».
languages.original_text: "Do not keep me waiting too long, {name}. My weapon is tired of languishing in its sheath."

traits.locale_text: «No me hagas esperar demasiado, {name}. A mi arma no le gusta languidecer en su vaina».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “别让我等太久，{name}，我鞘中的武器已经等得不耐烦了。”
languages.original_text: "Do not keep me waiting too long, {name}. My weapon is tired of languishing in its sheath."

traits.locale_text: “别让我等太久，{name}，我鞘中的武器已经等得不耐烦了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「俺をあまり長く待たせるな、{name}。俺の武器は、鞘の中で待ちくたびれているんだ」
languages.original_text: "Do not keep me waiting too long, {name}. My weapon is tired of languishing in its sheath."

traits.locale_text: 「俺をあまり長く待たせるな、{name}。俺の武器は、鞘の中で待ちくたびれているんだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Ne me faites pas attendre trop longtemps, {name}. Mon arme commence à se lasser de moisir dans son fourreau. »
languages.original_text: "Do not keep me waiting too long, {name}. My weapon is tired of languishing in its sheath."

traits.locale_text: « Ne me faites pas attendre trop longtemps, {name}. Mon arme commence à se lasser de moisir dans son fourreau. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Lasst mich nicht zu lange warten, {name}. Meine Waffe ist es leid, in ihrer Scheide zu dösen."
languages.original_text: "Do not keep me waiting too long, {name}. My weapon is tired of languishing in its sheath."

traits.locale_text: "Lasst mich nicht zu lange warten, {name}. Meine Waffe ist es leid, in ihrer Scheide zu dösen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Do not keep me waiting too long, . My weapon is tired of languishing in its sheath."

languages.text: "Çok fazla bekletme beni {name}. Silahımı kınında zor tutuyorum."
languages.original_text: "Do not keep me waiting too long, {name}. My weapon is tired of languishing in its sheath."

traits.locale_text: "Çok fazla bekletme beni {name}. Silahım kınında durmuyor artık."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
